plot: A poetic sketch of the contradictions of Pakistani society, where peasants dreaming of success in the city must live on the streets.
title: Concert on Footpath
plot_es: A poetic sketch of the contradictions of Pakistani society, where peasants dreaming of success in the city must live on the streets.
plot_en: A poetic sketch of the contradictions of Pakistani society, where peasants dreaming of success in the city must live on the streets.
